name: snip
description: macOS screenshot annotation tool with AI-powered organization
author: rixinw

scripts.build: node-gyp rebuild && CSC_IDENTITY_AUTO_DISCOVERY=false electron-builder --mac && npm run sign:adhoc
scripts.sign:adhoc: for app in dist/mac-*/Snip.app; do if codesign -v "$app" 2>/dev/null; then echo "Already signed: $app"; else codesign --force --deep --sign - "$app" 2>/dev/null && echo "Ad-hoc signed: $app"; fi; done
